name: Click It for Tickets
description:
Submission for the #1BitClickerJam

Relive the joy and frustration of collecting tickets for useless stuff while trying to land the jackpot in this arcade classic remade in 1-bit style with added bonuses like achievments and a couple hidden features ;)

Instructions *Please Read*:

Press button to start the light, press again to stop. Try and hit the Jackpot and collect as many tickets as possible. Can you unlock all items and achievments?

*PLEASE NOTE YOU WILL LOSE ALL UNSPENT TICKETS WHEN CASHING OUT*

Made in javascript using HTML5 Canvas, should work in most major browsers. Tested in Firefox and Chrome

Art and Programming - @killDashNyan (Twitter)

Sounds - Non-Existant [ Sorry :( ]
